title: Ticket #2175: it is possible to submit a job with no Owner attribute
description:
The following submit file may be used to submit a job with no Owner. 

executable = /bin/date
-Owner
queue
remarks:
2011-May-20 13:25:15 by matt:
OLD feature... 

commit 1cb0f6ffd6548176b53ef1e8a2e3cfe75e24b5fd
Author: raman <raman>
Date:   Tue Mar 11 17:50:41 1997 +0000

    + Now allows user to force arbitrary expressions into and out of the job
        classad.
    + Also ensured that types on the job ad were being set.
    + Minor formatting changes to make reading a list of submitted jobs easier.
creator: danb
